post.summary: Create Client Token to join a room.
post.description: Synchronously create an Client Token to join a Room. Client Token is necessary to join a Telnyx Room. Client Token will expire after `token_ttl_secs`, a Refresh Token is also provided to refresh a Client Token, the Refresh Token expires after `refresh_token_ttl_secs`.

parameters.name: room_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of a room.

requestBody.description: Parameters that can be defined during Room Client Token creation.
